meanings.definition: To read (copy) for errors in content or style.
meanings.sent1: I copyread my essay to check for mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She copyreads all the articles before they are published.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked the students to copyread their homework before submitting it.
meanings.sent4: He carefully copyread the document to ensure it was perfect.
meanings.sent5: Copyreading is important to catch any errors in the text.

meanings.definition: The process of editing and proofreading written material for publication.
meanings.sent1: Copyread is a crucial step in the publishing process.
meanings.sent2: The copyread of the manuscript revealed several typos.
meanings.sent3: The copyread of the novel took longer than expected.
meanings.sent4: The copyread of the magazine article was meticulous.
meanings.sent5: The copyread of the report improved its quality significantly.
